	
Entity objects extends the Entity class
class properties is indicated by annotation

Sample

{{{
/**
 *  @Table(name = "blog")
 */
class Blog extends Entity
{
}
}}}

Add Columns

/**
 *  @Table(name = "blog")
 */
class Blog extends Entity
{
/**
    @Id
    @Generated
    @Column(name = "id" ,type = "integer")
    */
    private $id;

     /**
     @Column(name = "name" ,type = "string")
     */
    private $name;
}
}}}
